entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this morning and this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:17 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 06:17 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon with flurries at times heavy. Risk of snow squalls late in the afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning then becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 late in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 06:17 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
